channel.title: VFX on seth.nz
channel.description: Recent content in VFX on seth.nz

item.description: EVANGELION RE:LIVED (W.I.P) EVANELGION RE:LIVED IS STILL A WORK IN PROGRESS STAY TUNED FOR UPDATES EVANGELION RE:LIVED About - This project is a homage to the works of Hideaki Anno, creator of the hit 90s anime Evangelion and the subsequent films that came out. Evangelion has become a cult classic, beloved across the world and it captured my heart in my teen years. I decided to make this project as my personal homage to Evangelion and the world Hideaki Anno created.

UNIVERSE UNIVERSE About - UNIVERSE is a hobby project of mine that I have been creating in Blender. I started this project to teach myself Blender and render some interesting planets, space ships and stars. I plan to release my final renders in video form sometime during 2025. ~ Socials - Instagram YouTube ~ Contact - If you have any inquires regarding my creative work or wish to chat about working together, get it touch with me by sending me an email to info@seth.
